name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta with a creamy sauce made from eggs, Parmesan, pancetta, and pepper.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Neapolitan pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese tossed in a Caesar dressing.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A rich and gooey chocolate cake with a molten center, served warm.

name: Tom Yum Soup
description: A spicy and sour Thai soup with shrimp, mushrooms, and lemongrass.

name: Beef Bourguignon
description: French stew made with beef braised in red wine, mushrooms, and onions.

name: Cheesecake
description: Creamy New York-style cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.

name: Miso Soup
description: Traditional Japanese soup made with miso paste, tofu, and seaweed.
